# Core Rule 4 - No sexual or shock content [color=SlateGray][italic]Revision A, 2025-10-11[/italic][/color]
There is zero tolerance for engaging in sexual or shock content.
Although SS14 contains profanity, crime, violence, gore, death, horror, substance abuse, and mental conditions, purposefully disturbing players is prohibited.
## Examples [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Using profanity such as "asshole," "shit," and "motherfucker." - Using emotes such as "[italic]claps,[/italic]" "[italic]flips you off,[/italic]" and "[italic]blows a raspberry[/italic]." - Describing gore within context of in-game medical and sanitation mechanics.
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Engaging in topics such as genitalia, eroticism, torture, and excretion. - Describing gore in more detail than necessary.
